|data scientist|1|West|Helena| MT
GIG|
The role

GiG is looking for a data scientist to work on initiatives to optimise the business. At GiG we want to be data driven from all aspects and see this area within data as a strategic pillar in the company's overall vision.
What you'll be doing
Innovate and come up with different ways to optimise GiG using several techniques coming from your own initiatives.
Contribute to the data science vision and strategy and organise sessions with the team explaining your work.
Work with verticals outside of the data team such as CRM
column4: Poker and come up with effective ways to get better results with predictive analytics.

column1: Collaborate with other verticals of the data team to deliver the use case at scale.
Assist in contributing to the development of our Big Data platform.
Deal with adhoc scenarios where analytics will help the business understand insights.
Create POCs using notebooks such as Jupyter and Zeppelin.
Promote using machine learning and educate your peers on why one model or algorithm works better for a scenario.
Willing to learn and contribute to the architectural blueprint which is a contribution from all verticals in the data team to come up with standards for reusability.
Guide peers to build intelligent algorithms that transform and improve our business.
Embrace and introduce best practices to deliver data science at scale.
Be at the front line of technology together with your peers and other verticals of the team and also introduce or suggest new technologies.
Having the will to learn new technologies that will help you be more effective.
Knowhow of programming languages such as Python
Who you are
2+ years' experience in data science / AI
Excellent communications skills
Ability to communicate complex statistical or machine learning concept and methodologies to all the team
Great presenter
column2: ability to sell the AI and data science strategy and its initiatives

column1: Experience and knowhow with Big Data and Hadoop
Excellent problem solving and critical thinking skills
What we offer
We GiGsters play hard
column2: but we work even harder. We take personal responsibility for our deliverables every day
column3: and we're killing it. We work as one GiG
column5: to make iGaming fair and fun for all. Each GiGster
column7: is empowered to be disruptive. And we are agile enough to make it happen. We are front-runners and deliver the best
